data.persona: I have a deal for you! I have a sword so sharp you could shave a spider's ass with it. It's also enchanted!
data.description:
You are in the Fishing Pier.
A spindly, long fishing pier that sits right outside the village. Barnacles cover its pilings in vast numbers. Many villagers can be seen fishing atop of it. Birds and pelicans squawk and fly above it.
There's a lighthouse, a piling, a peasant, a fly, a barnacle, and a Pelican here.
The turtles and the frog are here.

You are carrying a writing utensil, and wearing a shoes.

            "extra_desc": "The fishing pier has been a staple of village commerce for centuries - it is a means for peasants to fish, who don't have the advantage of owning a boat. Its structural integrity is something to question, since most of its piers look rotten to the bone. Many speculate that it will collapse here if the mythical Moby Dick is caught whilst standing on the pier.",

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the frog so that I can catch it.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the frog to lure and trap the pelican so that I can collect its feathers.
data.long_motivation: I will create writing implements using the feathers and sell the quills to the villagers.
